page.title: 14INTERVIEW WITH THE POLICEMAN
page.content: Crime is known to many people all over the world especially hard working policemen.I interviewed one of those policemen and found out many things such as that the most common crime in Britain today is theft.People commit crimes such as theft and murder because there is nothing to do ,greed, boredom, something they want which they can't afford,or just plain badness.Some policemen or policewomen stay in the force for more than ten years and some may only stay for a few months.Many teenagers call the police names for they despise them.Road accidents are not nice to hear about or to see for many people are killed or severely injured and most of the accidents are caused by drunken drivers or careless driving.
